title: TrioQ / QuadraQ: Plat 3 Jungler / Shotcaller looking for Teammates
body:
Hey guys,

I was Plat 3 last Season, play mainly Jungle and Mid and I just realized that you can played ranked with 2, 3 or 4 premade buddies. Also I found out, that this is a lot of fun when you use voice. 

Therefore I am looking for Season 5 **Plat+ Players** that
- never give up
- never surrender
- never ragequit
- can carry a game alone from time to time
- speak and understand Englisch
- have skype, teamspeak and curse or be willing to install it

Example of Shotcalling with full Germanspeak teammates:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n9SCnBX5--g

My Twitch Stream:
http://www.twitch.tv/wohltat

My OP GG Profile:
http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=wohltat

If you are interested, apply here in Forum or add me ingame.
